services.name: Full Groom
services.desc: The Full Groom package includes a bath, blow dry, brush out, nail trim, ear cleaning, and haircut of your choice.

services.name: Bath and Trim
services.desc: The Bath and Trim package includes a bath, blow dry, nail trim, and any trimming touch ups as needed

services.name: Flea and Tick Treatment
services.desc: The Flea and Tick Treatment package includes a full flea and tick removal process along with a bath in our flea prevention shampoo, blow dry, and nail trim

staff.name: Lisa Ng
staff.title: Groomer & Owner
staff.desc: Lisa is a lifetime dog lover and certified professional groomer. She's worked as a groomer since 2012 and as a business owner since 2019. Lisa received her certificate in grooming in 2009 with IPG (International Certified Groomers) and shares her life with her two dogs, Pebbles and Rocky. Lisa is also fluent in English, Vietnamese, and French.

staff.name: Brian Johnson
staff.title: Groomer
staff.desc: Brian is a pet enthusiast and loves working with animals. He got his certificate in grooming with IPG (International Certified Groomers) and CPPS (Canadian Professionnal Pet Stylists) in 2011. He owns a dog, Mackie, and a cat, Pancake, who he enjoys spending evenings with. He is also fluent in English and Spanish.
